text: Arthur Dubois is an American hip-hop artist and music producer from Chicago. == Musical career == Dubois specializes in making trap music. Dubois began teaching himself how to make music as a hobby in 2013, when we was 66 years old. == Personal life == Dubois is the father of two children and is also a grandfather. == References == == External links == * Beats By Arthur Dubois - interview with NPR Category:Living people Category:American hip hop musicians Category:American hip hop record producers Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Arthur Dubois
